price: (70) That is the bounty from Allāh, and sufficient is Allāh as Knower.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
